en.title: Clients
en.description: These are the projects I have been developing for my clients.

projects.title: EMURB's tax calculator and document generator[In development]
projects.summary: Back end, front end and database application. This application helps EMURB's employees to calculate the tax for certain services and to generate standarized documents.

en.title: Personal
en.description: These are my personal projects. If I am facing a problem that I think it would be interesting to develop a solution, I try to work on it.

es.title: Clientes
es.description: Estos son los proyectos que yo desarrollé para mis clientes.

projects.title: [es]Calculadora de taxas e gerador de documentos da EMURB [EM DESENVOLVIMENTO]
projects.summary: Aplicação com front end, back end e banco de dados. Permite que os funcionários da EMURB possam calcular a taxa de forma padronizada e facilitada. Além disso, é possível gerar guias de pagamento e documentos.
